list.name: Changes
list.comment: Remove `package-lock.json` to transition away from lockfile dependency management

task.summary: Default task
Refactor styles for improved consistency; simplify dark mode support and update project page display logic.
Remove redundant "Project Details" headings across project MDX files for cleaner content presentation.
Fix Vimeo embed URL parsing for project videos to handle differently formatted video URLs.
Add related projects section to project page; improve metadata handling and MDX evaluation style.
Update `.gitignore` to exclude all `webflow` directories and assets; revise `ProjectsClient` comments and refine workspace tasks.
Update `.gitignore` to exclude `/scripts/`; adjust project page padding for improved layout consistency.
Disable ESLint rule for `img` elements in project pages; remove unused `useDynamicImport` option from MDX evaluation.
Add type definitions for `Client` and `Category`; update `getClients` and `getCategories` to return typed records.
Remove `CustomMDX` component and `next-mdx-remote`; migrate to `@mdx-js/mdx` for improved MDX content evaluation.
Remove `@vercel/speed-insights` and related imports; update `pnpm-lock.yaml` and `package.json` dependencies accordingly.
Add `ProjectCard` component; integrate recent projects section on the homepage displaying featured projects.
Add client logos section to homepage; include client logos data and assets.
Remove blog functionality, including pages, posts, utilities, and related RSS feed integration.
Add About page with company values and vision; include hero banner and placeholder image.
Add contact form functionality with API integration; implement server-side validation, email sending, and rate limiting.
Configure ESLint in project settings; enable auto-fix on save.
Refactor codebase to standardize quotes; apply consistent formatting across components and utilities.
Remove `BlogPosts` component and related utilities; cleanup unused code and dependencies.
Add guide content for various thematic map types; implement pages on cartograms, choropleth maps, and data classification.
Add dynamic guide page with metadata, navigation, and structured MDX content rendering; update global styles with centered image support.
Migrate `data` files to `app/data` directory; update references and adjust guide content formatting.
Implement search functionality for guide articles; add search API, client-side search component, and build script for search index.
Update build script in `package.json` to use `pnpm` for running `build:search`.
Use `next/image` in `ProjectCard` for optimized image rendering.
Refactor: Modularize reusable components and utilities; integrate `PageSection` and `ProseWrapper` for consistent layout and typography across pages.
Add `ResourceCard` component and integrate resource section on homepage for showcasing tools and guides.
Update footer with copyright text and remove outdated links.
Update `.idea/workspace.xml` metadata to adjust task details and changelist comments.
Add Atlas of Rotavirus Prevalence project page with metadata, visualizations overview, and technical details.
Add CalSHARE Data Hub project page with metadata, detailed description, and video embedding enhancements.
Add Health Equity Illuminator project page with metadata, detailed description, and technical implementation details. Update category for related public health projects.
Add MapMaster 3 project page with metadata, detailed description, and technical implementation details.
Update MapMaster 3 project cover image.
Update MapMaster 3 project cover image path.
Update MapMaster 3 cover image path to correct file location.
Update imagineRio project page with new metadata, refined description, and improved technical details. Replace cover image and optimize project structure for clarity.
Add imagineRio Narratives project page with metadata, detailed description, and technical implementation details. Include new cover image and emphasize platform features for spatial storytelling.
Remove `featured` attribute from multiple project pages for consistency with updated metadata structure.

Add LARC Dashboard project page with metadata, detailed description, and technical implementation details. Include new cover image and emphasize visualization features for addressing reproductive health disparities.

Add PeopleForBikes Recreational project page with metadata, detailed description, and technical implementation details. Include new cover image and highlight platform features for assessing equitable access to bicycling infrastructure.
Remove `featured` attribute from Global Commodities Oil Visualization project for metadata consistency.
Update IntelliJ IDEA workspace metadata and adjust task details for recent project changes.
Add `.vercelignore` file to exclude unnecessary files and directories from deployment.

Implement responsive mobile menu for Navbar with animations
- Introduced `useState` and `useEffect` to handle menu toggle and outside click dismissal - Added animations (`fade-in`, `slide-in-from-top`) for dropdown and backdrop - Updated CSS to support mobile-specific and animated menu states - Adjusted desktop and mobile navigation styles for better responsiveness

Improve responsiveness in Recent Projects section layout
- Updated container to use `flex-col` with responsive `sm:flex-row` for better mobile layout - Adjusted button alignment using `self-start` and `sm:self-auto`
Make project category filter hidden on mobile for improved responsiveness

Improve responsiveness for guide pages
- Adjust search bar width to be full-width on mobile (`w-full sm:w-1/2`) - Update layout to use `flex-col-reverse` with responsive `sm:flex-row` for better alignment on smaller screens

Add GitHub Actions workflow and comprehensive test coverage
- Introduced `test.yml` workflow to run tests, coverage, build, and linter on main branch pushes and pull requests. - Added tests for `Contact API` handling email sending, rate limiting, validation, and error scenarios. - Implemented tests for content utilities, including filtering, related, and featured content retrieval. - Included tests for date formatting with edge cases and relative time options. - Added MDX utilities tests covering frontmatter parsing, directory scanning, file reading, and error handling.
Remove `package-lock.json` to transition away from lockfile dependency management

Implement responsive mobile menu for Navbar with animations
- Introduced `useState` and `useEffect` to handle menu toggle and outside click dismissal - Added animations (`fade-in`, `slide-in-from-top`) for dropdown and backdrop - Updated CSS to support mobile-specific and animated menu states - Adjusted desktop and mobile navigation styles for better responsiveness

Add GitHub Actions workflow and comprehensive test coverage
- Introduced `test.yml` workflow to run tests, coverage, build, and linter on main branch pushes and pull requests. - Added tests for `Contact API` handling email sending, rate limiting, validation, and error scenarios. - Implemented tests for content utilities, including filtering, related, and featured content retrieval. - Included tests for date formatting with edge cases and relative time options. - Added MDX utilities tests covering frontmatter parsing, directory scanning, file reading, and error handling.
Update GitHub Actions `test.yml` to use latest pnpm version for workflow steps
Remove `package-lock.json` to transition away from lockfile dependency management

option.name: LAST_COMMIT_MESSAGE
option.value: Remove `package-lock.json` to transition away from lockfile dependency management
